casa-gfed3-v2: carnegie-ames-stanford-approach global fire emissions database 3 v2
ffdas-v2: fossil fuel data assimilation system v2
ecco2_darwin-v3: estimating the circulation and climate of the ocean, phase ii; darwin-v3
geos-chem: global 3-d chemical transport model (ctm) for atmospheric composition driven by meteorological input from the goddard
mitgcm: massachusetts institute of technology general circulation model
bling: biology light iron nutrient and gas model
casa-gfed3-v3: carnegie-ames-stanford-approach global fire emissions database 3 v3
clm-lsm: common land model (clm) land surface model
vic-lsm: variable infiltration capacity (vic) land surface model
merra: modern-era retrospective analysis for research and applications
merged ir: ncep/cpc l3 half hourly 4km global (60s - 60n) merged ir
landmet: ccny noaa-crest land surface atmospheric boundary processing method
merra-2: the second modern-era retrospective analysis for research and applications
forcing-lsm: forcing data for land surface model
rm-obs/pu: hybrid of ncep/ncar reanalysis model and observations by princeton university
unified model um: united kingdom met office (ukmo) unified model
penman-monteith: penman-monteith model with enhanced surface resistance parameterization
